comments:

IllegalArgumentException because layout constraints 
java.awt.BorderLayout.NORTH, CENTER ... are unknown.

VE: I20040714

This sounds like you've got a classpath problems such that it didn't recognize
the JRE. Also are you at the correct builds of Eclipse, GEF, and EMF for the
that VE build? Did you start with a clean workspace?

I just tried this with the latest integration build (I20040721) and it worked
fine. I dropped a standard JButton into the contentpane (w/BorderLayout) of a
class extending JFrame. I also dropped my own extended JPanel into another
region without any problems. This function has been working for ages and hasn't
been changed. It should work for the build you are working with (I20040714).
Since this bug was not reOpened for more than a month, this bug is verified.

traces.message: cannot add to layout: unknown constraint:  java.awt.BorderLayout.NORTH
